messages.subject: Re: petty complaint: answering myself
messages.msgSnippet: I found a solution, to copy the italicized portion into a new email window and un-italicize it. It works. Hope this helps someone......got the idea from being
messages.messageBody:
I found a solution, to copy the italicized portion into a new email window
and un-italicize it. It works. Hope this helps someone......got the idea from
being on an AOL message board and using the reply window to read hard-to-read
fonts or italics. There is no solution for someone who types(shouts) in CAPS
lol.

Ang
Unschooling mom to
Megan(10) Ashlyn(3) Christian(1.5)
<A HREF="http://hometown.aol.com/unolist/index.html">UNO Unschoolers Network of Ohio</A>
<A HREF="http://members.aol.com/megamom08/page1.html">My Links Page MEGAMOM08</A>
